name: Monochrome Library
description:
Monochrome Library is a third person puzzle platformer. Players must unlock color coded doors with their respective keys to uncover the secrets of this library. Red means death, if a Player comes into contact with any red object they will die immediately. Jump and navigate over obstacles in order to reach new areas and arrive at the deepest part of the library!

Controls:

Player Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys 

Jump: Space Bar

Camera Control: Mouse

Created By: Ashton Wilks (Lab 01)

v0.100
